name: iValueHealth.NET
tag_list: mhealth, social-health-community, medicine, patients, medical-professionals, medical-service-providers, medical-equipment-manufacturers, insurance, kol, sme, ngo, foundations, telecom-operators
overview:
iValueHealth.NET (http://beta.iValueHealth.NET) is a Health related multilingual platform (or Hub) where users can access basic medical information, health applications and connect with healthcare professionals in just 2 clicks. World’s first & leader in connecting all healthcare ecosystem in one place. It has gained more than 150k members in less than 2 years.

The portal has three types of content: (1) Medical information on medicine field, symptoms, diseases and medications (2) Healthcare professionals can publish and share articles (text, images and videos) about what’s going on, best practices, trends, research work etc. (3) Applications or services. The website currently has more than 50+ services and a roadmap of 100+ services to be launched by end of 2013.

Members have access to the largest online database featuring medicine fields, symptoms, diseases, medications, videos, images and articles. It is a unique initiative where all the actors from the healthcare ecosystem are brought together in one place and can contribute together to increase the awareness by sharing more local and global information.

Users can connect “free of charge” on the platform, using their email ID, and define their role when they connect for the first time (general user, medical professional, pharmacist…). Once connected, users can access different medical content and applications to which they get rights (based on their role). The platform will be accessible in 8 languages (English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Romanian, Bahasa Indonesian and Tagalog Filipino – some of them are yet to go online).

iValueHealth.NET is a Health related initiative by alumnus of IIM Bangalore, ISB Hyderabad, ESCP Europe, SDMCET, MDI Gurgaon, Red McCombs Austin. The company is member and have received support from mHealth Alliance (United Nations Foundations) and Microsoft BizSpark team.

Portal: http://beta.iValueHealth.NET Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/iValueHealth.NET Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/iValueHealthNET
